title: The Communist Manifesto
author: Karl Marx & Friedrich Engels
description: A foundational text that outlines the theory of historical materialism and class struggle, published during the revolutions of 1848.

title: Socialism: Utopian and Scientific
author: Friedrich Engels
description: A short work explaining the differences between utopian socialism and scientific socialism, laying out the materialist conception of history.

title: State and Revolution
author: Vladimir Lenin
description: An analysis of the state, violent revolution, and the dictatorship of the proletariat, written during the Russian Revolution.

title: The Transitional Program
author: Leon Trotsky
description: A program of transitional demands aimed at bridging immediate struggles with the ultimate goal of socialist revolution, written for the founding conference of the Fourth International.
